snippet.title: Nightmare Pursuit - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3018630/Nightmare_Pursuit/

DISCORD : 
https://discord.gg/MZEUrAT7XQ

Step into a world where every corner holds terror. In Nightmare Pursuit, team up or go it alone as you face off against three unique killers, each with a chilling backstory and deadly abilities. Will you survive the pursuit, or become the next victim? Watch the trailer now and Wishlist on Steam!

#horrorgaming #multiplayer #indiegame #horror
